title: A remark on the Whitney Broken Circuit Theorem
authors: Paula M. S. Fialho, Emanuel Juliano, Aldo Procacci
abstract:
In the present note we show, via the connection between chromatic polynomial
and Potts model, that the Whitney Broken circuit theorem is in fact a special
case of a more general identity relating the chromatic polynomial of a graph
G=(V,E) to sums over forests of G associated to some partition scheme in G.
